articles.author: Harley Tamplin
articles.title: Huge police hunt for 'gunman' spotted in south east London
articles.description: Police are searching for a man reported to be carrying a gun in south east London. People in Chislehurst have been warned to stay in their homes as officers search for the suspect. Armed officers and a large number of police vehicles have flocked to the scene, according to witnesses. They are searching nearby fields […]
